section.title: Splunk: Sending log messages to Splunk
section.para: Although &abbrev; currently does not have any built-in integration with Splunk, the existing message-formatting features and flexibility of &abbrev; allows you to forward your log messages to Splunk. In &abbrev; version 3.87.0.4 or later, you can use the http() destination. In earlier versions, you can use the program() destination.
For details on forwarding log messages to Splunk with &abbrev; see the following posts on the Splunk blog:

para.link: syslog-ng and HEC: Scalable Aggregated Data Collection in Splunk
